alertas.loginIncorrecto: Login error, check your credentials and try again
alertas.alertaEliminar: Are you sure to delete the record?

backend.generico: Something was wrong while processing the request. We apologize for the inconvenience.

conexion.404: The page you have requested is not available.
conexion.424: Something was wrong while calling an external service. We apologize for the inconvenience.
conexion.500: Something was wrong while requesting at the application server. We apologize for the inconvenience.
conexion.403: You have no access to application.
conexion.401: You are unauthorized to access to application.
conexion.generico: Application's web server is not available.

backend.session: You are unauthorized to access to application or your session is expired. You may login again.
